parameterdescription.para: - where the camera is looking at
- where the camera is looking at

briefdescription.para: To be called every frame. Camera will get user inputs and update its position and orientation.

parameterdescription.para: - The object that the camera wants to look at.
- Vector of AABB hitbox to test if camera is colliding with anything.

briefdescription.para: Camera mode that is not affected by any hitboxes.
Camera mode that only allows Yaw Rotation and controlling vehicle's thrust.
Sets Yaw and Pitch from mouse movement.
The class camera, and any functions that moves the camera.
